metadata.title: CVE-2016-9645 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The fix for ikiwiki for CVE-2016-10026 was incomplete resulting in editing restriction bypass for git revert when using git versions older than 2.8.0. This has been fixed in 3.20161229.

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180228-1').
